data.title: Renumbering a BASIC program
data.solution:
import re
n=int(input())

d=dict()
lines=[]

linum=0
for i in range(n):
    linum+=10
    m=re.match(r"^([0-9]+) (.*)$",input())
    d[m[1]]=str(linum)
    lines+=[m[2]]

linum=0
for l in lines:
    linum+=10
    s=re.sub(r"\b(GOTO|GOSUB) ([0-9]+)\b",lambda m:m[1]+" "+d[m[2]],l)
    print(linum,s)
data.statement:
A program written in BASIC language needs renumbering. Line numbers should start with {{10}} with an increment of {{10}}.
Parameters of <<GOTO>> and <<GOSUB>> commands should be changed accordingly.

testCases.title: FIBONACCI NUMBERS
testCases.testIn:
10
1 REM FIBONACCI NUMBERS UP TO 500
5 A=0
6 B=1
14 IF A>500 THEN GOTO 500
15 PRINT A
16 C=A
17 A=B
18 B=C+B
20 GOTO 14
500 END
testCases.testOut:
10 REM FIBONACCI NUMBERS UP TO 500
20 A=0
30 B=1
40 IF A>500 THEN GOTO 100
50 PRINT A
60 C=A
70 A=B
80 B=C+B
90 GOTO 40
100 END

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
10
1 REM FIBONACCI NUMBERS UP TO 20
2 X=0
3 Y=1
4 IF X>20 THEN GOTO 20
5 PRINT X
6 Z=X
7 X=Y
8 Y=Z+Y
10 GOTO 4
20 END
testCases.testOut:
10 REM FIBONACCI NUMBERS UP TO 20
20 X=0
30 Y=1
40 IF X>20 THEN GOTO 100
50 PRINT X
60 Z=X
70 X=Y
80 Y=Z+Y
90 GOTO 40
100 END

testCases.title: PASCAL TRIANGLE
testCases.testIn:
23
10 PRINT "WHICH ROW OF PASCAL TRIANGLE?"
20 INPUT N
25 N=N-1
30 FOR K=0 TO N
40 X=N
41 GOSUB 1000
42 NF=F
45 X=K
50 GOSUB 1000
55 KF=F
60 X=N-K
61 GOSUB 1000
62 NKF=F
70 PRINT NF/(KF*NKF),
71 NEXT K
75 PRINT
80 END
1000 REM PUTS FACTORIAL OF X INTO F
1001 F=1
1002 FOR I=1 TO X
1004 F=F*I
1005 NEXT I
1006 RETURN
testCases.testOut:
10 PRINT "WHICH ROW OF PASCAL TRIANGLE?"
20 INPUT N
30 N=N-1
40 FOR K=0 TO N
50 X=N
60 GOSUB 180
70 NF=F
80 X=K
90 GOSUB 180
100 KF=F
110 X=N-K
120 GOSUB 180
130 NKF=F
140 PRINT NF/(KF*NKF),
150 NEXT K
160 PRINT
170 END
180 REM PUTS FACTORIAL OF X INTO F
190 F=1
200 FOR I=1 TO X
210 F=F*I
220 NEXT I
230 RETURN

testCases.title: Validator 3

23
21 PRINT "WHICH ROW OF PASCAL TRIANGLE?"

25 M=M-1
30 FOR L=0 TO M
40 X=M

52 NF=G
55 X=L
60 GOSUB 2000
65 KF=G
70 X=M-L
71 GOSUB 2000
72 NKF=G
80 PRINT NF/(KF*NKF),
81 NEXT L
85 PRINT
90 END
2000 REM PUTS FACTORIAL OF X INTO G
2001 G=1
2002 FOR I=1 TO X
2004 G=G*I
2005 NEXT I
2006 RETURN
testCases.testOut:

20 INPUT M
30 M=M-1
40 FOR L=0 TO M
50 X=M
60 GOSUB 180
70 NF=G

90 GOSUB 180
100 KF=G
110 X=M-L
120 GOSUB 180
130 NKF=G
140 PRINT NF/(KF*NKF),
150 NEXT L
160 PRINT
170 END
180 REM PUTS FACTORIAL OF X INTO G
190 G=1
200 FOR I=1 TO X
210 G=G*I
220 NEXT I
230 RETURN

testCases.title: FIZZBUZZ
testCases.testIn:
12
1 PRINT "UNTIL WHAT NUMBER?"
2 INPUT N
3 FOR I=1 TO N
4 Y$=""
5 IF INT(I/3)=I/3 THEN Y$=Y$+"FIZZ"
6 IF INT(I/5)=I/5 THEN Y$=Y$+"BUZZ"
7 IF Y$="" THEN GOTO 19
10 PRINT Y$
15 GOTO 21
19 PRINT I
21 NEXT I
23 END
testCases.testOut:
10 PRINT "UNTIL WHAT NUMBER?"
20 INPUT N
30 FOR I=1 TO N
40 Y$=""
50 IF INT(I/3)=I/3 THEN Y$=Y$+"FIZZ"
60 IF INT(I/5)=I/5 THEN Y$=Y$+"BUZZ"
70 IF Y$="" THEN GOTO 100
80 PRINT Y$
90 GOTO 110
100 PRINT I
110 NEXT I
120 END

29 PRINT I
33 NEXT I
34 END

120 END

testCases.title: No change
testCases.testIn:
1
10 REM SEARCH "BIRTH OF BASIC" FOR MORE
testCases.testOut: 10 REM SEARCH "BIRTH OF BASIC" FOR MORE

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read LINE:string(255)
loop N write line
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> Number of lines [[N]]
<<next N lines :>> Program lines

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A program written in BASIC language needs renumbering. Line numbers should start with 10 with an increment of 10.
Parameters of GOTO and GOSUB commands should be changed accordingly.
Input
Line 1 : Number of lines N
next N lines : Program lines
Output
N lines of code
Constraints
1<=N<255
Example
Input
2
1 PRINT "HELLO WORLD"
2 GOTO 1
Output
10 PRINT "HELLO WORLD"
20 GOTO 10
